title: Ping has been getting higher recently
body:
About 2-3 weeks ago my ping was normal hovering between 26-31, now for some reason the ping seems to be going between 35-50, it feels laggy as fuck which is odd because even 35-50 ping shouldn't be laggy, league is the only game this happens in so.

Anyone else been getting this?

replies.body: +++... do you´ve already fixed it somehow ? Re-install ? I rly dont want to delete and install it after every patch x) The next time someone gives my that tip, i´m going to delete it for the last time but i wont install it again... :)
